name: TempusRain
0:
”Alexa, ask Tempus Rain when will it rain in Boston today”
”Alexa, ask Tempus Rain in Seattle when it is going to rain tomorrow”
”Alexa, ask Tempus Rain at what hours will it rain in San Jose today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tempus rain
des:
Get hour specific rain forecasts for your city! The skill provides hour specific rain forecasts over the next 4 days. 
The skill can recognise the following cities for now: GNV , Chicago , San Jose , Gainesville , San Francisco , Washington DC , Boston , New York City , Portland and Seattle. 
More cities will be added in the future, soon! Sorry for the inconvenience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
